alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Aransas and southeastern San Patricio Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Aransas Pass, or 8 miles northwest of Port Aransas, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portland, Rockport, Port Aransas, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Gregory, Ingleside On The Bay, Palm Harbor, Key Allegro, Copano Village and Fulton. This includes US Highway 181 between mile markers 638 and 640. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands
